Question
========

In a small company with six employees, each week we track which of the two teams (A and B) earns the most. Using the Wilcoxon test to see which team is better than the other. The difference between team A and team B is: A - B = 3. It follows for the ranks of the teams it follows that

Answerlist
----------

* A had (1, 2, 6) and B had (3, 4, 5).
* A had (1, 2, 3) and B had (4, 5, 6).
* A had (4, 5, 6) and B had (1, 2, 3).

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A had (1, 2, 6) and B had (3, 4, 5)...: Incorrect
* A had (1, 2, 3) and B had (4, 5, 6)...: Incorrect
* A had (4, 5, 6) and B had (1, 2, 3)...: Correct
